attributes.action: Ban Fireworks From Public Sale and Licence Use at Organised Displays Only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is only September 16th and I have already heard five firework bangs this evening. My cat has run in terrified and is hiding under the stairs. How many more will we here before November 5th.

Noise from fireworks can cause harm to humans and animals. When in the wrong hands they can even prove lethel.

They should be banned from public sale and licenced for use at public displays only.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
